long_description: The Patagonia Down coat protects your active girl from the cold weather with its long length and exceptionally light and warm down insulation for all her winter adventures on the urban frontier. 600-fill-power goose down is quilted under a lightweight, high-tear-strength polyester shell. Durable Water Repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off, fending off light rain showers and snow. Full-length, two-way front zipper lets you ventilate from the top and the bottom. The girls' Patagonia Down coat features a deep hood for cold-weather protection and fleece-lined handwarmer pockets for added warmth.
short_description: The Patagonia Down coat protects your active girl from the cold weather with its long length and exceptionally light and warm down insulation for all her winter adventures on the urban frontier.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Boys And Girls
